name: Pop League
description:
Pop League is a new best pop game!

Role is simple:
1.Click on the square, if there are similar types of squares around, they will be eliminated together.
2.Gravity will connect the remaining squares together.
3.The more points are eliminated continuously, the higher the score will be.
4.After reaching the target score, you will enter the next level.
5.Eliminate more than 3 consecutively and there will be new squares falling.

Features:
◉ Well-designed pop roles。
◉ Auto save and record replay.
◉ Tablet support
◉ Global Leaderboards

Pop League is Suit for all age and completely FREE to play!
Now play and become the best Pop League player in world!
